title: Want To Be Happier? Evidence-Based Tricks To Get You There
description: Everyone wants to be happy, and science has some answers. In this episode, Laurie Santos, the host of The Happiness Lab podcast, shares the science of cultivating gratitude and reframing positive thinking.
